chemoreception.notes: Inferred presence due to parasitic lifestyle on fish, likely used for host detection and selection. General to parasitic flatworms.

mechanoreception.notes: Inferred presence for orientation and attachment to the fish host. General to parasitic flatworms.

photoreception.notes: Presence or absence of photoreceptors is unknown in this family. Many flatworms have simple eyespots, but it's unclear if Microcotylidae retain them.
